remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> must have a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with it. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> can then write out the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>. The only way to associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> is by using this constructor.
